attachments.fallback: GitHub: Do not change &formatprg globally by ujihisa · Pull Request #498 · elixir-editors/vim-elixir
attachments.title: Do not change &formatprg globally by ujihisa · Pull Request #498 · elixir-editors/vim-elixir
attachments.text: Since &formatprg is &quot;global or local to buffer&quot;, :set does not only change &formatprg of the current buffer, but also any other buffers. Prefer :setlocal instead. :h formatprg ...
